revision.text:
{{Infobox Berry |name = #52 Chilan |image = [[File:Chilan.png]] |caption = This Berry can be cored out and dried to make a whistle. Blowing through its hole makes an indescribable sound. |growtime = 2h 0m 0s |harvest = 10 berries |replant = 5% |points = 500 |flavor =
*0 spicy *25 dry *10 sweet *0 bitter *0 sour }} '''Chilan''' is a type of [[Berries|Berry]] that can be planted in the [[Farm]]. It can be obtained by surrounding a [[Chople]] with at least 3 [[Chople]]. The surrounded [[Chople]] will then have a chance to mutate into this berry. {| class="wikitable" |+ Growth Stage Durations ! Seed !! Sprout !! Taller !! Bloom !! Berry |- | 0-240s || 240-1430s || 1430-2970s || 2970-7200s || 7200-14400s |- | [[File:AllTreeSeed.png|50px]] || [[File:AllTreeSprout.png|50px]] || [[File:ChilanTreeTaller.png|50px]] || [[File:ChilanTreeBloom.png|50px]] || [[File:ChilanTreeBerry.png|50px]] |} === Possible Planting Formations === You can fill your [[farm]] in following way to obtain Chilan berry. {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |+ Farm |- | style="width: 40px;" | [[Chople]] || style="width: 40px;" | [[Chople]] || style="width: 40px;" | [[Chople]] || style="width: 40px;" | [[Chople]] || style="width: 40px;" | [[Chople]] |- | [[Chople]] || [[Chople]] || [[Chople]] || [[Chople]] || [[Chople]] |- style="height: 26px;" | [[Chople]] || [[Chople]] || [[Chople]] || [[Chople]] || [[Chople]] |- | [[Chople]] || [[Chople]] || [[Chople]] || [[Chople]] || [[Chople]] |- | [[Chople]] || [[Chople]] || [[Chople]] || [[Chople]] || [[Chople]] |}
